rows.label: tev001195_MSG0001
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0002
rows.name: Oh, hello, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0003
rows.name: Sorry about that. I was just lost in thought.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0004
rows.name:
Or maybe it's more accurate to say that I was getting
a bit sentimental.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0005
rows.name:
When exactly did this place become my home?
When did I grow to love it so?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0006
rows.name: So many unexpected things have happened, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0007
rows.name:
And yet, humanity has begun to lay down roots on
this planet in spite of it all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0008
rows.name:
I don't know. Maybe that's why I feel like my
perceptions have changed a little.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0009
rows.name:
When I finish a mission and return to the barracks,
it really feels like I'm coming home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001195_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Elma you feel the same way.

rows.label: tev001195_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: tev001195_SEL0021
rows.name: Say you don't feel that way at all.

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0010
rows.name: It makes me happy to hear that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0011
rows.name:
Interesting. Is that because you miss your home back
on Earth?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0012
rows.name:
Or am I the strange one for getting sentimental over
what amounts to a simple military housing facility?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0013
rows.name: ...No, that's not fair. They're more than that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0014
rows.name:
Did you know that our floor is unique within the
BLADE barracks?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0015
rows.name:
Our quarters are larger than those of the other teams,
and also come with the biggest kitchen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0016
rows.name:
I've been blessed to be able to share them only with
people I trust completely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0017
rows.name:
Nagi and Vandham even allowed me to bring Lin and
Tatsu in here, despite her age and his... Well, him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0018
rows.name: It was good of them to make all that happen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_JNK0030
rows.name: Speculate

rows.label: tev001195_SEL0031
rows.name: Assume that it's due to her rank as a colonel.

rows.label: tev001195_JNK0040
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev001195_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask why Elma was given such special treatment.

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0019
rows.name: Hah. No, I'm afraid that's not it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0020
rows.name:
BLADE has no ranks—not in a practical kind of way,
I mean. The only people who really care that I'm a
colonel are Irina and Gwin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0021
rows.name:
Think about it—would you and Lin really want to live
under the same roof as someone you had to address
as "colonel" all the time?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0022
rows.name: No, rank means nothing here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0023
rows.name:
Anyway, if we have another opportunity someday,
I might tell you more about it. ...And about me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0024
rows.name:
But for now, we should drop it. I know you're busy
enough without me taking up all your time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0025
rows.name: That's actually a bit...tricky.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0026
rows.name:
Perhaps once we've secured the Lifehold Core,
I can take the time to do the explanation justice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0027
rows.name: Besides, this is no time to reminisce about the past.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0028
rows.name: I know you have missions of your own to pursue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0029
rows.name: Now let's both get out there and do our best.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0030
rows.name: I assume you know why I get "special treatment" now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0031
rows.name:
It's because my true nature has to be concealed from
the general public.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0032
rows.name:
True, I'm using a mimeosome like everyone else,
so the odds of my being discovered are quite low.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0033
rows.name:
However, my knowledge of Earth culture and customs
isn't exactly...flawless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0034
rows.name:
While my appearance is unlikely to betray me,
my lack of knowledge and experience very well could.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0035
rows.name:
That's why I was allowed to form a team composed
only of those I trusted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0036
rows.name:
Not to say I don't trust Irina—I just knew her talents
could be put to better use elsewhere.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0037
rows.name: Well, that's enough about me. We should get going.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001195_MSG0038
rows.name:
After all, we've both got a great deal to accomplish
for the good of New LA.[ST:wait ]
